resources.string: Focus the camera on the Barcode!
1. To start go to Cart\n 2. Click on the cam icon to add items to the shopping cart\n 3. After adding all the items click on PayNow
1. Enter any product name you want to search\n 2. Click on search\n 3. The place and price of the product will be shown if available
1. Click on the + icon to add items to the List\n 2. To remove just click on the - icon
